name: Rabbit with a (Gambling) Habit
description:
Climb a precarious grid of dice to reach the High Roller table, or die trying. Also, you're a rabbit.

An arcade-ish platformer made in 48 hrs by Avery Hiebert and Steven Gu for the 2022 GMTK Game Jam (theme: "Roll of the Dice").

Fullscreen mode is highly recommended.

Controls:

left/right or A/D to move

up/W/spacebar to jump

wall jumping is allowed and encouraged

Goal:

Get to the High Roller table at the top of the tower of dice.  You can also earn money along the way by collecting combos (Snake Eyes, Boxcars, Mia, the Venus throw, and Yahtzee; see in-game instructions).
